mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user( id, loginAct, name, loginPwd, email, expireTime, lockState, deptno, allowIps, createTime, createBy, editTime, editBy) VALUES( #{id}, #{loginAct}, #{name}, #{loginPwd}, #{email}, #{expireTime}, #{lockState}, #{deptno}, #{allowIps}, #{createTime}, #{createBy}, #{editTime}, #{editBy})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_user WHERE loginAct=#{loginAct} AND loginPwd=#{loginPwd}
